name: Apawcalypse (itsjackson, NuttyMcNutt, SirSoundwave, iloah)
description:
The Game:

        This game was made for Red Storm's NCSU VGDC Game Jam. The theme was zombie cat, and we had under 48 hours to create a game from scratch. Our team used Unity 2d to create a side-scroller platformer. In the game, you slowly lose health, and take damage from various sources. When injured, you have debuffs that make it much harder to platform! The good news? You can kill enemies for their brains! Can you defeat the rat king?

        PermaPets, the only pets that can't die, are sweeping Peak City's suburbs as the perfect pet! The only problem is that the supervillain who created them activated their secret protocol: to mutate into zombies and overthrow the city's government. Unfortunately for him, there was a defective unit, whose love for its family has forced it to defend the city against it's attackers with its new super powers!

The group members:

Jackson Westbrook - Player Mechanics, Sound Effects

Billy McCarthy - Enemy Mechanics, Music, Some Pixel Art

Zach McNutt - Background/Foreground Pixel Art

Hao - Player Pixel Art, Drawings
